sentences.en: Do you plan to repaint the wall?
Fixed repaint problem on Options screen when resizing.
sentences.cn: 修正调整大小时重绘问题在选项萤幕上.

sentences.en: I suppose you repaint the apartment when someone moves in.
sentences.cn: 我想如果有人搬进来住,你们会把房子重新粉刷一下的.

sentences.en: I was going to sand down the chairs and repaint them.
sentences.cn: 我打算用砂纸把椅子打磨光洁后重新上漆。

sentences.en: Make sure you rub down the window frames before you repaint them.
sentences.cn: 务必把窗框擦光滑后再重新上油漆.

sentences.en: Neighbor: To help scrub the building interior clean so that we can repaint it.
sentences.cn: 邻居: 帮忙把建筑的内部擦洗干净.好让我们可以粉刷.

sentences.en: She repaint them over and over. But the results were exactly the same.
sentences.cn: 她反复再三的重画了一遍又一遍. 但是结果仍然如此.

sentences.en: So that we can repaint it.
sentences.cn: 好让我们可以重新粉刷.

sentences.en: They careened the fishing boat to repaint the hull.
sentences.cn: 他们将渔船倾斜过来重新油漆船体.

sentences.en: They hired a small company to repaint the dining room.
sentences.cn: 他们雇用一个小公司重新油漆饭厅。

sentences.en: We had to repaint the gutters with linseed oil.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不用亚麻子油重漆水槽.

trans.tran_en: to apply a new or fresh coat of paint

trans.tran_cn: 再次（重新）油漆，再次（重新）画，恢复…原来的色彩
